name: Japanese Rail Sim: Operating the MEITETSU Line
name_original: Japanese Rail Sim: Operating the MEITETSU Line
description:
What is Japanese Rail Sim?

The Railway Japan! Series is a train operating game with recorded live-action video.
While following the operating rules of a professional train operator, the player must successfully operate the high-speed express and limited express trains to reach the terminal station!
In addition, the video imagery showcases the essence of present-day Japan, making it of great value as a visual piece on its own.

Features

  • Operate the 37.6km route from Meitetsu Gifu to Jingū-mae on the Nagoya Line!
  • A realistic reproduction of the operator's seat of the Meitetsu Express 3500 Series!
  • Experience the exhilaration of operating a train in the suburbs with real images and sounds!

Enjoy professional train operating!

In Japanese Rail Sim: Operating the MEITETSU Line, you can experience smooth train operating from low to high speed travel through live-action video footage. By referring to the Operating Monitor on the right side of the screen, you can experience operating that is close to the real thing!

The green line is the ideal speed, and whether or not you can adjust the spead along this line is the first step to achieving professional operating.
Some sections offer a high degree of difficulty and require exceptional operating skills, such as places where acceleration and deceleration are undulating.

Control your speed well and aim for high ratings so that you reach your destination safely and on time!
